The Council employs benefits advisors who can maximise your income by helping you to claim all the benefits which you are entitled to.

Our benefit advisors will talk to you to find out about your personal circumstances to find out what benefits you could be claiming. They can also help you to fill in any forms, and can support and represent you at appeals and tribunals.

If you would like to make an appointment to see a benefit advisor, you should use the contact details above.

How much benefit can I receive before I have to pay for home care?

Personal Living Allowance for Single Adults and Couples

Please note that you qualify for the 'disabled rate of Personal Living Allowance' if you receive one of the following benefits...

  • Attendance Allowance
  • Disability Living Allowance
  • Long-term Incapacity Benefit
  • Severe Disablement Premium

or if you...

  • Are Registered Blind
  • Have an Invalid Trike
  • Have been incapable of work for 28 weeks or more
